content: {"updates": [{"pattern": ".*?Try to monetize my dog on social media—he has viral potential\\.\\*\\*", "replacement": "🔹 **Try to monetize my dog on social media—he has viral potential.** (This idea initially came up while evaluating a pet-focused franchise opportunity. AI recognized that my dog’s unique abilities could be an asset to marketing that venture. It later reframed this as a **low-risk, high-reward** way to learn social media, experiment with AI automation, and explore an alternative income stream—while simply sharing something I already do: spending time with my dog and my family. Even if it doesn’t take off, the skills learned will still be valuable in adapting to a world where personal branding and AI-driven content creation are becoming necessary skills.)"}]}
